QuestData.Title: Set the Mantid Back
QuestData.Description: Every day, the mantid build up munitions for use on their enemies. We cannot stop them, just you and I... but we can set them back.$b$b<Tai Ho hands you some explosives.>$b$bI need to keep a low profile. Would you do the honors?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Gunpowder Casks to explode the Kri'thik Weapons and the Kri'thik Supplies in Kri'vess.
